title: Radio Replay: This Is Your Brain On Ads
description: How many ads have you encountered today? On this week's radio replay, we discuss the insidiousness of advertising in American media. We begin with new reporting about the effects cereal commercials have on children. Later in the program, we revisit one of our favorite episodes of 2018, Buying Attention.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
